name: El Payaso: Siempre Triste, Siempre Engañoso
description: Primary colors were perfect for the themes of anger and sadness. The shade of red is carmine, the color of dried blood. The clown was decapitated and carmine suggests this happened long ago. Represents the end of a toxic relationship and the slow process of healing. Drawing made with India ink, gel ink, and alcohol ink on paper. Dimensions: 4668 × 5691. https://www.twitter.com/shamikachu https://www.instagram.com/shamiferngully/ https://www.shamikalovesink.com
